divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend were taking a night walk. I was just looking up at the sky because it was so beautiful out...every star was shining in the sky.I then noticed a big bright light in the sky moving very slowly in a west to east direction. This light almost looked like a close...very bright white star. It obviously was not a star...because it was moving, and it was definetly not a plane. There were no wing lights flashing...it was a white..solid ball of light. As I was watching this light, it suddenly began to fade away very fast till I could'nt see it anymore. Just to mention...we saw a similar light the night before that behaved the same exact way. I would love to have tooken some pictures of them...but I didnt have access to a camera at the time.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around May 24th 2009
